title: Feature Request: Colored Borders
author: simon1tan
body_snippet: Often times, we are quick to type a command only to realize we are in the wrong session. Can we create a colored border that may make it easier to distinguish one session from another? I know the tab shows it but it's so small and not where most people are looking when they are typing.

iterations.description: Feature request for colored borders around connection panels to visually distinguish sessions (e.g., prod vs dev) — common request in remote management tools

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request for colored borders around connection panels to visually distinguish sessions (e.g., prod vs dev) — common request in remote management tools
Approach: Add a BorderColor property to ConnectionInfo, persist it in XML/SQL serializers, and render a colored border on the active tab or panel when a connection is selected
